msg: [RELEASE CHECKIN] Derby release ID set to: 10.9.1.0

author: cframpton
msg: Ran RAT (which BTW just became a top-level project with a new name) and found way too many files still without Apache copyright headers.  This is the first batch.

author: juhanic
msg: FLUME-1194 RecoverableMemoryChannel prop misspelled -- "rentention" should be "retention"

author: jorton
msg: suexec: Support use of setgid/setuid capability bits on Linux, a
weaker set of privileges than the full setuid/setgid root binary.
* Makefile.in: If configured, use setcap instead of chmod 7555 on
setuid bit if capability bits are used.

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-5688: Update status file and release notes on 10.9 branch.
